entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Cornwall
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:17 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint-Anicet 08:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023
Temperature: -2.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -2.8°C
Wind: NE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023
